name: Sweetcorn
properties: Rich in lutein and zeaxanthin for eye health
Provides B vitamins and vitamin C
benefits: Sweetcorn features in multiple recipes including corn chowder and black-eyed bean salad. While technically a grain, corn on the cob or kernels provide fiber and resistant starch. Rich in carotenoids lutein and zeaxanthin that support eye health. When cooled, corn develops resistant starch that feeds beneficial gut bacteria.
amount: 1½ cups fresh or frozen kernels per recipe (about 260g)

quotes: 1½ cups/260g fresh or thawed frozen sweetcorn
black beans, pepper, corn, avocado and coriander
